review.author: DevOps + Architect
findings: Task 1 (Event Pipe): DevOps dual-write in team-memory appendPatternHookEvent mirrors pattern events to ledger_events. 6 suites/29 tests pass.
Task 2 (Timestamps): evidence-ledger-memory.js and evidence-ledger-investigator.js now treat null/undefined/blank as fallback to Date.now(). 17 tests pass.
Task 3 (Worker Lifecycle): Handler re-setup passes re-register flag, evidence-ledger unregister skips closeSharedRuntime during re-setup. 7 tests pass.
Tasks 4+6+7 (Docs): 15+ config/doc files fixed — hardcoded model-to-role mappings removed, stale SDK refs updated, Investigator→Analyst nomenclature synced.
Cross-model verified: Ana (Gemini) confirmed DevOps (Codex) code fixes via BACKEND VERIFIED Level 1. Full test suite 141/141, 3232 tests pass.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
